name: Pixel Wizards
description:
This is a game were you fight off the undead  using magic. This game is going to be a wave base shooter with some RPG elements mixed in with it and it is online co-op , up to 4 player per match. This game is currently in development mode so the server can only hold 16 player max at this time.    

This game is a work in  progress, any feedback, suggestions, or donations  are greatly appreciated and will help us improve the game.  

PLEASE FILL OUT SURVEY AFTER PLAYING THE GAME SO WE CAN IMPROVE THE GAME! :)

CONTROLS

  1. Movement: WASD
  2. Run: Left Shift
  3. Camera: Mouse
  4. Attack 1: Left Mouse Down (Melee)
  5. Aiming: Right Mouse Down
  6. Attack 2: Aiming + Left Mouse Down (Water Spell)
  7. Interact: Q (Open doors by standing in front facing towards door)
  8. Pause / Unpause: Escape
